calculateScore(WindowPattern) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.DiagonalsPublicObjectiveCard

Returns the score of a given windowPattern according to this objective card criteria.
calculateScore(WindowPattern) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.PrivateObjectiveCard
Calculates the score of a given window pattern according this objective card (scoring depends only on card's color).
calculateScore(WindowPattern) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.RowsColumnsPublicObjectiveCard
Calculates the score of a given window pattern based on the RowsColumnsPublicObjectiveCard's score criteria Transposes the pattern if the check is by columns, in order to avoid code duplication The number of different properties of a row must be equal to the number of columns of the pattern if every property is different, since there is one property for each dice and one dice for each cell (row, column)
calculateScore(WindowPattern) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.SetPublicObjectiveCard
Calculates the score of a given window pattern according this objective card.
